page.title: 10CHURCHES BISHOPBRIGGS
page.content:
{Denominations}
Bishopbriggs has nine main centres of worship. Three of these, Cadder, Kenmure and Springfield/Cambridge are {Church of Scotland.}There are also a {Free Church of Scotland,}a{Scottish {Episcopal Church}and a{Gospel Hall. Within Bishopbriggs there are also two {Roman Catholic}parishes, St.Matthew's and St.Dominic's. A{Christian Centre has also been formed with its own community building their own homes and living in close proximity to each other. This Centre is affiliated to the{Baptist Union of Scotland. All these churches, regardless of size of congregation have various organisations, not only of a religious nature to offer their members.
